Package org.jboss.seam.init

Stuff for starting and initializing Seam in a servlet environment.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ComponentDescriptor Meta-data about a Seam component.
ComponentDescriptor.PrecedenceComparator  
DependencyManager Evaluates component dependencies to determine which components are installed.
DeploymentDescriptor Parser for ejb-jar.xml and orm.xml deployment descriptors
EjbDescriptor Meta-data about an EJB, discovered from a deployment descriptor.
EjbEntityDescriptor  
Initialization Builds configuration metadata when Seam first initialized.
NamespacePackageResolver Converts an XML namespace to a Java package name.
 

Package org.jboss.seam.init Description

Stuff for starting and initializing Seam in a servlet environment. You don't need to call this stuff yourself.
